dict.string: Today is 37 days, which are five weeks and two days, of the Omer.
Hoy es treinta y siete días que son cinco semanas y dos días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est trente-sept jours, qui sont cinq semaines et deux jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ТРИДЦАТЬ СЕМЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ПЯТЬ НЕДЕЛЬ И ДВА ДНЯ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם שִׁבְעָה וּשְׁלֹשִׁים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם חֲמִשָּׁה שָׁבוּעוֹת וּשְׁנֵי יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר
Gevurah ShebeYesod
Gevura ShebeIesod
Guevoura chebeYessod
ГВУРО ШЕБЕ-ЙЕСОЙД
גְּבוּרָה שֶׁבִּיסוֹד
Gevurah of Yesod
Discipline in Bonding

Examine the discipline of your bonding. Bonding must be done with discretion and careful consideration with whom and with what you bond. Even the healthiest and closest bonding needs "time out,” a respect for each individual's space.
We All Come From One Place
The antidote to divisiveness and to cognitive dissonance is to acknowledge that we all come from one place. We all share one soul. This is practical Kabbalah.
https://youtu.be/uQZgt1xh-6Y
Review your bonding experiences to see if they need more discipline or change.
Do I overbond?
Am I too dependent on the one I bond with?
Is he too dependent on me?
Do I bond out of desperation?
Do I bond with healthy, wholesome people?
